result.name: student-income-and-expenditure-survey-2011--2012
result.notes: Income and expenditure of students - derived from a survey of around 3,000 full-time and 900 part-time English-domiciled students at 96 institutions in England and Wales.  Income and expenditure are broken down under a number of headings to allow a detailed exploration of both.  Data was gathered at January-April 2012.  The survey is carried out every 3 to 4 years.

organization.name: department-for-business-energy-and-industrial-strategy
organization.title: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
organization.description:
The department brings together responsibilities for business, industrial strategy, science, innovation, energy, and climate change.
We are responsible for:
developing and delivering a comprehensive industrial strategy and leading the government’s relationship with business
ensuring that the country has secure energy supplies that are reliable, affordable and clean
ensuring the UK remains at the leading edge of science, research and innovation
tackling climate change

result.title: Student Income and Expenditure Survey 2011 / 2012

extras.value: Date to be agreed - but likely before end of December 2013.  Data from previous surveys have been made available on the Economic and Social Research Council (ESRC) Data Archive.  It is expected that Student Income and Expenditure Survey (SIES) 2011 / 2012 data will also be lodged there.
